thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 16 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Deutsche Technologie Beteiligungen: Claims Against EGM Agenda Item

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Deutsche Technologie Beteiligungen: Claims Against EGM Agenda Item
text:
Jan 16 (Reuters) - DEUTSCHE TECHNOLOGIE BETEILIGUNGEN AG :
* SAID ON MONDAY HAD LEARNED THAT SEVERAL ACTIONS FOR ANNULMENT OF AGENDA ITEM 3 OF THE EXTRAORDINARY GENERAL MEETING OF DEC. 8, 2017 CONCERNING A CAPITAL INCREASE IN KIND HAD BEEN RAISED
* THEREFORE, IT CAN NOT BE EXCLUDED THAT THE IMPLEMENTATION OF CAPITAL INCREASE AGAINST CONTRIBUTION IN KIND DECIDED BY THE EGM WILL FAIL BECAUSE OF THE COMPLAINTS
* COMPANY WILL INVESTIGATE THE CLAIMS Source text for Eikon:
Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
